meanings.definition: Anoretics: individuals suffering from anorexia nervosa
meanings.sent1: Anoretics often have a distorted view of their bodies.
meanings.sent2: Support groups can be helpful for anoretics on their journey to recovery.
meanings.sent3: The anoretics in the therapy session shared stories of their struggles.
meanings.sent4: She felt like anoretics, constantly battling against her own mind.
meanings.sent5: The fragility of anoretics is a reminder of the importance of mental health.
